insert into po_podetails (po_podetails_id, c_po_id, po_id, c_inv_code, i_quantity, i_unit_price, i_money, i_tax, i_sum, i_nat_unit_price, i_nat_money, i_nat_tax, i_nat_sum, d_arrive_date, i_inv_qty, i_inv_money, i_nat_inv_money, i_per_tax_rate, c_define24, i_tax_price, i_arr_money, i_nat_arr_money, f_po_valid_quantity, f_po_valid_num, f_po_arr_quantity, i_vouchrow_no, freceived_qty, c_bsysbar_code) values
(#{item.id}, #{item.cpoid}, #{item.poid}, #{item.cinvcode}, #{item.iquantity}, #{item.iunitprice}, #{item.imoney}, #{item.itax}, #{item.isum}, #{item.inatunitprice}, #{item.inatmoney}, #{item.inattax}, #{item.inatsum}, #{item.darrivedate}, #{item.iinvqty}, #{item.iinvmoney}, #{item.inatinvmoney}, #{item.ipertaxrate}, #{item.cdefine24}, #{item.itaxprice}, #{item.iarrmoney}, #{item.inatarrmoney}, #{item.fpovalidquantity}, #{item.fpovalidnum}, #{item.fpoarrquantity}, #{item.ivouchrowno}, #{item.freceivedqty}, #{item.cbsysbarcode})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE po_podetails_id = values(po_podetails_id), c_po_id = values(c_po_id), po_id = values(po_id), c_inv_code = values(c_inv_code), i_quantity = values(i_quantity), i_unit_price = values(i_unit_price), i_money = values(i_money), i_tax = values(i_tax), i_sum = values(i_sum), i_nat_unit_price = values(i_nat_unit_price), i_nat_money = values(i_nat_money), i_nat_tax = values(i_nat_tax), i_nat_sum = values(i_nat_sum), d_arrive_date = values(d_arrive_date), i_inv_qty = values(i_inv_qty), i_inv_money = values(i_inv_money), i_nat_inv_money = values(i_nat_inv_money), i_per_tax_rate = values(i_per_tax_rate), c_define24 = values(c_define24), i_tax_price = values(i_tax_price), i_arr_money = values(i_arr_money), i_nat_arr_money = values(i_nat_arr_money), f_po_valid_quantity = values(f_po_valid_quantity), f_po_valid_num = values(f_po_valid_num), f_po_arr_quantity = values(f_po_arr_quantity), i_vouchrow_no = values(i_vouchrow_no), freceived_qty = values(freceived_qty), c_bsysbar_code = values(c_bsysbar_code)
